title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The ornate blade, known for its elegant design, features a finely crafted silver edge that gleams with a lethal sharpness. Intricate gold engravings adorn the hilt and blade, showcasing masterful craftsmanship that highlights its status as a prestigious weapon. The handle, wrapped in textured black material, provides a firm grip for swift, agile strikes. This weapon not only symbolizes power and prestige but also serves as a formidable tool in battle, capable of inflicting devastating damage on foes. Perfect for skilled warriors, this sword represents both art and lethality in the realm of combat.
